name: Today is the Day
description:
A small zine to remind you what day it is. Read right here on the page or download a PDF. Click/tap on page edges or use arrow keys to turn pages.

Made with Electric Zine Maker

Displayed using a template you can download here.

Made entirely live on stream.

╔═══━━━─── • ───━━━═══╗ 

Made with love just for you. 

Find me on Twitter. 

╚═══━━━─── • ───━━━═══╝
